response.overview: The 1st story, According to the village law, a widow who lost her husband must accept night visits from the men of the village after one year of mourning, in order to maintain the prosperity of the village's race. The 2nd story, with rent rising, Ryoko begs the manager for a way to earn more. Ryoko moves from a completely sexual local massage to the next level service. One day, the younger brother finds out what his older sister's job is, but the landlord helps them out as a customer. However, six months later, Ryoko was pregnant with the landlord's child. The 3rd story, Ryoko, who is an apprentice decided to offer her naked body as a model. The master finally demands the body of his beloved disciple who endures the humiliation and serves him with all her might. The master depicted a woman being raped by her editor and twisted in pain. Tormented by shame and humiliation, Ryoko vows to take revenge, and a year later, she competes with her master and wins the illustration grand prize.
